content.html: I find it really easy to focus while traveling on a train. Maybe because when I travel, I'm not in a hurry, and also ... you can't escape from the train 😁 Perhaps the best employee benefit I ever had was when I worked for a railway company: unlimited free train rides
content.value:
I find it really easy to focus while traveling on a train. Maybe because when I travel, I'm not in a hurry, and also ... you can't escape from the train 😁

Perhaps the best employee benefit I ever had was when I worked for a railway company: unlimited free train rides
